text: Palaeochoerus was an extinct genus of even-toed ungulates that existed throughout Africa during the Oligocene, and throughout Eurasia during the Miocene. ==References== Category:Prehistoric pigs Category:Fossil taxa described in 1847 Category:Miocene even-toed ungulates Category:Miocene mammals of Africa Category:Oligocene even-toed ungulates Category:Oligocene mammals of Asia Category:Oligocene mammals of Europe
title: Palaeochoerus
